title:
Anomalous Hall effect in metallic collinear antiferromagnets with
  charge-density wave order
abstract:
In this paper we propose two theoretical models of a metallic N\'{e}el
ordered antiferromagnet with charge-density wave order which shows the
anomalous Hall effect. In our models a combination of the N\'{e}el order and
the charge-density wave order results in spin splitting of the conducting
fermions. In addition, spin-orbit coupling is required to drive the anomalous
Hall effect. In the first model we analyzed the effects of the Rashba
spin-orbit coupling, and of the intrinsic $d-$wave spin-orbit coupling in the
second model.
